fields.text: Welcome to UrbanSitter, San Francisco’s most trusted on-demand community for babysitters and nannies.
If you are a parent seeking childcare services, press '[INDEX]' to speak with our family care team.
To book a new babysitter or nanny, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with our booking team. A representative will be with you shortly.
For questions about an existing reservation, billing inquiries, or to modify your booking, press '[INDEX]'.
Thank you for holding. We’re now connecting you to our reservations team.
If you are a babysitter or nanny looking to join our community, press '[INDEX]' to speak with our talent team.
To apply as a new sitter or nanny, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we forward you to our onboarding specialists.
For current sitters to manage your profile, availability, or payments, press '[INDEX]'.
Thank you. We’re transferring you to our community support team now.
